optic.dsp.core.finddelay

finddelay(x, y)

Find delay between x and y.

Parameters:

  • x (np.array) -- Signal 1.

  • y (np.array) -- Signal 2.

Returns:

d -- Delay between x and y, in samples.

Return type:

int
